title: an option obect
description: Layer Options for add or edit

options.description: Layer Options for add or edit

document.description: Set of document level edits. Document level edits will always be applied AFTER layer level edits have been performed. One of `canvasSize`, `imageSize` or `trim` is required

globalFont.description: The full postscript name of the font to be used as the global default for the document. This font will be used for any text layer which has a missing font and no other font has been specifically provided for that layer. If this font itself is missing, the option specified for manageMissingFonts from above will take effect.

fonts.description: Array of custom fonts needed in this document

manageMissingFonts.description: Action to take if there are one or more missing fonts in the document. `fail` - The job will not succeed and the status will be set to `failed`, with the details of the error provided in the `details` section in the status.`useDefault` - The job will succeed, however, by default all the missing fonts will be replaced with this font: ArialMT
